semesterprojekt2017.client.rpc

Interface RPCService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceImplDatabase

    @RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="rpcservice")
public interface RPCService
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

        java.util.ArrayList<UserDTO> getPantUsers()
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method for returning all the users and their information
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of UserDTO objects containing all the information relevant to the admin
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the method is passed an illegal or inappropiate argument

      • getAmountOfUsers

        int getAmountOfUsers()
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method for statistics calculation
        Returns:
        a value indicating the total amount of users in the system, excluding the admin (see the implementation)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the method is passed an illegal or inappropiate argument

      • getAmountOfPant

        double getAmountOfPant()
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method for statistics calculation
        Returns:
        a value indicating the total amount of pant collected for all users
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the method is passed an illegal or inappropiate argument

      • getPantUser

                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method for returning a single Pant User's collected pant
        Parameters:
        id - of the selected pant user
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing Pant objects showing information about collected pant

      • authorizeUser

        UserDTO authorizeUser(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method for checking login credentials
        Parameters:
        username - the String entered in the username box by the guest
        password - the String entered in the password box by the guest
        Returns:
        an object containing the user's information on succesful login or an object with null values if the user doesn't exist
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the method is passed an illegal or inappropiate argument

        Method for changing a user's password

        newPass - is the new password the user wants
